Name: Statue of the Exarch
Text: Persistence, 1 (This card is not destroyed after activation. When this card is revealed, it gains 1 Persist counter(s). In the end phase of your turn, remove 1 Persist counter from this card or destroy it.) While this card is revealed in play, it is the only card that Persist counters must be removed from in the end phase. When this card leaves play, destroy all allied Persistance cards in play.
